entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0178.10150] The filing includes a value of 0.035 for dividends declared using the concept us-gaap:CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared and the dimension member of us-gaap:CommonStockMember on the axis StatementClassOfStockAxis. This member should not be used with this concept as the type of stock declared is already communicated with the concept name, and the dimensions provides no additional disaggregation.
The properties of this fact are: Period :2022-11-03 to 2022-11-03 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementClassOfStockAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : USD/shares
Rule Element Id:10150 Rule version: 24.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1703056/000170305623000046/adt-20221231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared

property.name: unitRef
property.value: usdPerShare ($ / shares)
